name: Tile Puzzle (novumbit)
description:
Tile puzzle is simple, yet surprisingly challenging and fun board game style logic game. Here you use logic to tap and swipe tiles in order remove them from the game. The premise is simple: break these blocks to earn points and unlock other special color tiles.

Game control:
In this game each tile has a special effect. Tile effect can be activated by swiping (up/down or left/right) or taping on them.

Features:
● 4 puzzle modes
● 7 different types and abilities
● Randomly generated puzzles
● 3 difficulty levels
● Simple swipe & tap controls
● Minimalist design
